meanings: (군사 공격) [명사] ambush, raid, blitz, surprise[sudden] attack, [동사] ambush, raid, blitz (=급습)

examples.korean: coup de main 발음듣기 기습. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The army attacked at night to surprise the rebels. 발음듣기 군대가 밤에 반란군들을 기습 공격했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The army attacked at night to surprise the rebels. 발음

examples.korean: Police stormed the building and captured the gunman. 발음듣기 경찰이 그 건물을 기습하여 그 총기범을 붙잡았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Police stormed the building and captured the gunman. 발음

examples.korean: Five shops were damaged in a firebomb blitz. 발음듣기 그 폭탄 기습 공격으로 상점 다섯 곳이 파괴되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Five shops were damaged in a firebomb blitz. 발음

examples.korean: A surprise air attack was launched at night. 발음듣기 야간에 기습 폭격이 감행되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A surprise air attack was launched at night. 발음
